scripts.watch:all: yarn watch & yarn workspace sb-theme-example watch & yarn workspace ui-theme-example watch & yarn serve
scripts.start: yarn watch & yarn workspace sb-theme-example start & yarn workspace ui-theme-example start
scripts.build: yarn workspace gatsby-plugin-eufemia-theme-handler build && yarn workspace ui-theme-example build && yarn workspace ui-theme-example serve & yarn workspace sb-theme-example build && kill-port 8002
scripts.serve: yarn workspace sb-theme-example serve & yarn workspace ui-theme-example serve
scripts.clean: yarn workspace sb-theme-example clean & yarn workspace ui-theme-example clean
